column4: Hey, check out this: Microsoft describes ubuntu as perfect: http://209.85.129.104/search?q=cache:wrLRF8L6fpsJ:www.windowsmarketplace.com/details.aspx%3Fview%3Dinfo%26itemid%3D3411347+windows+market+place+ubuntu+is+perfect&hl=no&ct=clnk&cd=5&gl=no
They also describe Vista as 'good', so I don't think we'd want to be associated with them in any wany.
haha good point, although I still think it's kinda funny :)
